metadata.title: Youth Arrests By PUMA
metadata.description: This CSV file contains estimates of number of youth (aged 16-24) arrests in Public Use Microdata Areas (PUMAs) for 50 states + DC in the United States. It includes data on the count of youth arrests, the youth arrests per population, and the youth arrest density.
metadata.author: Zofia Stanley

columns.name: PUMA
columns.description: Public Use Microdata Area ID (unique within each state)

columns.name: count
columns.description: Estimate of youth (aged 16-24) arrests in the PUMA

columns.name: arrest_per_pop
columns.description: Estimate of youth arrests per 1,000 residents aged 16-24 in the PUMA

columns.name: arrest_density
columns.description: Estimate of youth arrests per sq. km. in the PUMA
